maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Offc. Nailson
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Off. Nailson

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Offc. Nailson
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Off. Nailson

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Greetings, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. There is nothing to see here, so please stand back.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Bonjour à vous, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Il n'y a rien à voir ici, donc circulez s'il vous plait.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Offc. Nailson
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Off. Nailson
... Salut.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Welcome, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. The chief told me we would get some qualified support.\. Let's hope you are up for it!
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Bienvenue, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Le chef m'a dit que nous recevrions du support qualifié. Espérons que vous êtes à la hauteur !

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: The situation here is highly volatile.\. Criminals of the violent Papagang have stormed the building and taken hostages.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: La situation ici est très variable.\. Des criminels du violent Pépégang ont envahi le bâtiment et pris des otages.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: We assume that they have demands of some sort, but we can't make any sense of their squawking.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Nous supposons qu'ils ont des demandes. Mais nous ne comprenons rien à leurs jacassements.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: This is where you come in, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Go in there and try to \c[3]negotiate with them\c[0] to keep those hostages safe.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: C'est là que vous entrez en jeu, \v[lore.title.seeker].\. Allez là-dedans et essayez de \c[3]négocier avec eux\c[0] pour sauver les otages.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Try to use your fancy \c[3]\v[lore.title.seeker]-eloquence\c[0] to \c[3]resolve it peacefully\c[0].\. Don't traumatize those civilians!
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Essayez d'utiliser votre magnifique \c[3]Éloquence de \v[lore.title.seeker]\c[0] pour \c[3]résoudre ça dans le calme\c[0].\. Ne traumatisez pas ces civils !

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: But if all else fails, at least \c[3]free the hostages\c[0] before engaging in a wild shootout!\. \v[area.jungle-city.name] is counting on you!
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Mais si tout le reste échoue, au moins, \c[3]libérez les otages\c[0] avant de vous engager dans une fusillade sauvage !\. Le \v[area.jungle-city.name] compte sur vous !

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Bye !

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Offc. Nailson
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Off. Nailson

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Go inside and try to negotiate with those flying gangsters to keep the hostages safe.\. Violence might traumatize the civilians.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Allez à l'intérieur et essayez de négocier avec ces gangsters volants pour garder les otages en sécurité.\. La violence risque de traumatiser les civils.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: If talking still fails, at least \c[3]free the hostages\c[0] before engaging in a wild shootout!
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Mais si la négociation échoue, au moins, \c[3]libérez les otages\c[0] avant de vous engager dans une fusillade sauvage !

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Offc. Nailson
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Off. Nailson

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Hi.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Salut.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Finally, you're back.\. We heard a lot of noise in there, so I assume you couldn't solve it peacefully?
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Enfin vous êtes de retour.\. Nous avons entendu plein de bruit, donc j'imagine que vous n'avez pas pu résoudre la situation dans le calme ?

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: [shakes head]
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: That's a shame.\. Would have made our reports easier and saved a lot of trouble with the press.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: C'est dommage.\. Cela aurait rendu notre rapport plus simple et nous aurions évité des ennuis avec la presse.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: In any case, you cleared up the situation and prevented serious damage.\. We can count that as a win.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: En tout cas, vous avez résolu la situation et empêché de sérieux dommages.\. On peut compter ça comme une réussite.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: I will call the sarge and give him a brief report.\. Go back to the HQ to get your reward.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Je vais appeler le sergent et lui donner un bref rapport.\. Revenez au QG pour obtenir votre récompense.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Bye !

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Offc. Nailson
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Off. Nailson

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Report back to Sgt. Bronzel at the HQ.\. I already gave him a summary of your performance.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Revenez voir le Sgt. Bronzel au QG.\. Je lui ai déjà donné un résumé de votre performance.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Bye !

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Offc. Nailson
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Off. Nailson

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Greetings \v[lore.title.seeker]. Everything's peaceful in this disctrict.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Bonjour à vous, \v[lore.title.seeker]. Tout est calme dans ce district.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Offc. Nailson
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Off. Nailson

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Hi.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Salut.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Oh, thank the Ancients, you're back, \v[lore.title.seeker]!\. Maybe now we can finally get this damn tower back under control.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Oh, par les Anciens, vous êtes de retour, \v[lore.title.seeker] !\. Peut-être que maintenant on va pouvoir mettre cette satanée tour sous contrôle.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: At least there are no hostages between the lines, but still...\. Those criminal birds seem more aggressive than ever.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Au moins il n'y a pas d'otages dans la ligne de mire, mais quand même...\. Ces criminels sont plus agressifs que jamais.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: They got themselves fortified up on the roof with crates full of fruits and other stolen goods, while preparing to fly them away.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Ils se sont barricadés sur le toit avec des caisses de fruits et d'autres bien volés, et se préparent à les faire décoller d'ici.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: You need to get inside and \c[3]take the elevator to the highest floor\c[0].\. From there you can reach \c[3]the roof\c[0] and \c[3]secure the crates\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Vous devez aller à l'intérieur et \c[3]prendre l'ascenseur jusqu'au dernier étage\c[0].\. D'ici vous pourrez atteindre \c[3]le toit\c[0] et \c[3]sécuriser les caisses\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: We will send some \c[3]transport aircraft\c[0] to pick them up.\. All you will need to do is \c[3]power their magnets\c[0] to load the crates.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Nous allons envoyer quelques \c[3]avions de transport\c[0] pour les récupérer.\. Tout ce que vous aurez besoin de faire est d'\c[3]alimenter leurs aimants\c[0] pour charger les caisses.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Well, and keep the gangsters at bay.\. We're counting on you, \v[lore.title.seeker]!
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Bon, ça, et naturellement de garder les gangsters loin de vous.\. On compte sur vous, \v[lore.title.seeker] !

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Bye !

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Offc. Nailson
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Off. Nailson

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Go inside and \c[3]take the elevator to the highest floor\c[0].\. From there you can reach \c[3]the roof\c[0] and \c[3]secure the crates\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Allez à l'intérieur et \c[3]prenez l'ascenseur jusqu'au dernier étage\c[0].\. D'ici vous pourrez atteindre \c[3]le toit\c[0] et \c[3]sécuriser les caisses\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Offc. Nailson
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Off. Nailson

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Hi.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Salut.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Ah, there you are.\. Nice job up there, we got confirmation that all the crates have made it back in one piece.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Ah, vous voilà.\. Bon travail là-haut. Nous avons obtenu la confirmation que toutes les caisses ont été ramenées en sécurité.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Looks like you showed a pretty solid performance this time.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: On dirait que cette fois vous vous êtes bien battu.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Even Sgt. Bronzel and, Ancients help us, the press won't find much to complain about.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Même le Sergent Bronzel et, que les Anciens nous aident, la presse ne trouvera rien à redire.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Time to go back to Sgt. Bronzel at the HQ.\. The report of the operations should have already reached him.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Il est temps de retourner voir le Sergent Bronzel au QG.\. Le rapport des opérations devrait déjà être arrivé jusqu'à lui.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Bye !

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Offc. Nailson
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Off. Nailson

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Return to Sgt. Bronzel at the HQ.\. The report of this operation should have already reached him.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Retournez voir le Sergent Bronzel au QG.\. Le rapport des opérations devrait déjà être arrivé jusqu'à lui.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Bye !

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Offc. Nailson
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Off. Nailson

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.orig: Greetings \v[lore.title.seeker]. Everything's peaceful in this disctrict.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/329/.text: Bonjour à vous, \v[lore.title.seeker]. Tout est calme dans ce district.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.orig: Dude, you won't believe what happened at work.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.text: Mec, tu ne vas pas croire ce qui vient de se passer au boulot.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.orig: Someone breached our systems. All of them.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.text: Quelqu'un a pénétré dans nos systèmes. Absolument tous.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.orig: Damn.. You always were so paranoid about security.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.text: Mince... Et tu étais pourtant si paranoïaque sur la sécurité.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.orig: Adding like millions of checks and such.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.text: Tu as installé des millions de vérifications et tout.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.orig: I am, man! I have no idea how the intruder got in...
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.text: Oui, je sais ! J'ai aucune idée de comment l'intrus a pu rentrer.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.orig: Almost like it was one of us...
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.text: Comme si c'était l'un d'entre nous...

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.orig: Obviously we all took polygraphs, all kinds of drama.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.text: Bien entendu, on a dû tout vérifier, on a tous dû passer au détecteur de mensonge. Un drame sans fin.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.orig: But nothing was found. Nothing at all.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.text: Et on a rien trouvé. Rien du tout.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.orig: It should be. Unless someone KNEW all the passwords.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.text: Oui. Sauf si quelqu'un connait les mots de passe. TOUS les mots de passes.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.orig: I'm not sure who to trust at work anymore.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.text: Je ne sais plus à qui faire confiance au boulot maintenant.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.orig: I would, but I really need the money, man...
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/333/.text: J'aurais bien voulu, mais j'ai besoin de cet argent...

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/337/.orig: Hey dude, check out my Balls!
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/337/.text: Hé mec, regarde un peu mes Boules !

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/337/.orig: Dude. are you serious with the \c[3]unfunny jokes?\c[0]
Please don't make any Ball jokes ever again.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/337/.text: S'il te plait, ne fais plus jamais de blagues sur les Boules.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/337/.orig: I know you're a relatively new player so let me tell you this: No.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/337/.text: Je sais que tu es un peu nouveau à CrossWorlds, donc laisse-moi te dire ceci : Non.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/337/.orig: It's as unfunny as it gets and will make you very unpopular very quick.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/337/.text: C'est aussi nul que ça en l'a l'air, et sinon ça va te rendre impopulaire assez rapidement.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/337/.orig: So I can't relish in my sophisticated humor?
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/337/.text: Donc mon humour génial ne te plait pas ?

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: Van Samuels
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Van Samuels

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: Oh look, it's another Spheromancer!
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Oh, regarde, un autre Spheromancer !

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: Hi!
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Salut !

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: You... you're \c[3]level 99\c[0]!
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Tu... tu es \c[3]niveau 99\c[0] !

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: Nice!! Welcome to the \c[3]Max Level Club\c[0]!
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Super !! Bienvenue au \c[3]Club du Niveau Max\c[0] !

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: Lea!
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Lea !

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: And? How many Hedgehags did you kill to reach it?
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Et ? Combien de \v[combat.name.hedgehog] tu as tués pour en arriver là ?

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: Wait! Are you gonna count them one by one?
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Attends ! Tu vas vraiment tous les compter un par un ?

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: I'm not sure I have that much time!
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Je ne suis pas sûr que j'ai suffisamment de temps !

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: Hm...\. so you're \c[3]Level \v[player.level]\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Hm...\. Donc tu es \c[3]Niveau \v[player.level]\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: You're really entering high level territory.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Tu entres vraiment dans le territoire des haut niveaux.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: Pretty decent level! Appropriate for the \c[3]late end game\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Un niveau décent ! Approprié pour la \c[3]dernière phase du jeu\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: Good level for \c[3]Sapphire Ridge\c[0] and \c[3]Rhombus Square\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Un bon niveau pour la \c[3]\v[area.forest.name]\c[0] et \c[3]\v[area.rhombus-sqr.name]\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: That is a pretty common level for \c[3]Gaia's Garden\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: C'est un niveau assez commun pour le \c[3]\v[area.jungle.name]\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: Or so I was told, anyway.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Ou c'est ce qu'on m'a dit en tout cas.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: You see...\. when I reached Basin Keep, I was already \c[3]level 99\c[0].
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Tu vois...\. quand j'ai atteint le \v[area.jungle-city.name], j'étais déjà \c[3]niveau 99\c[0].

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: How?
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Comment ?

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: I bashed Hedgehags. Lots of them.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: J'ai bousillé du \v[combat.name.hedgehog]. Encore et encore.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: Back in Autumn's Rise.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: À \v[area.autumn-area.name].

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: For a very...\. very long time.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Pendant un très...\. très long moment.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: Why?!
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Pourquoi ?!

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: Because I needed those EXP.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Parce que j'avais besoin de ces EXPs.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: Best way to get them at high level.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: C'est le meilleur moyen de les avoir à haut niveau.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: Killing lots of Hedgehags. One EXP at a time.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: De tuer des tonnes de \v[combat.name.hedgehog]s. Un EXP à la fois.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: 1000 Hedgehags per level... for well over 50 levels.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: 1000 \v[combat.name.hedgehog]s par niveau... Pour plus de 50 niveaux.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: I reached level 99.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Et donc j'ai atteint le niveau 99.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: Over an endless trail of dead Hedgehags.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: En laissant derrière moi une trainée sans fin de cadavres de \v[combat.name.hedgehog]s.

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: I am a Hedgehag's worst nightmare.
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: Je suis le pire cauchemars d'un \v[combat.name.hedgehog].

maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.orig: B-Bye...
maps/jungle-city/west.json/entities/345/.text: B-Bye...
